item.title: About me
item.description: Research interests Combinatorial problems, Bioinformatics, Real-time scheduling, Text-driven Knowledge Graph completion. Work experience 2022 - 2023 University of Modena and Reggio Emilia Research Grant on Automated completion of Knowledge Graphs from textual sources. Funded by Emilia Romagna Region Education November 2023 - now University of Pisa PhD student in Computer Science 2020 - 2022 University of Modena and Reggio Emilia Master degree in Computer science, cum laude. Thesis on Real-time Scheduling Analysis.
